column4: hi. is there a utility that will  a) rip a CD to a single lossless file with all the track timing etc maintained, and  b) rip individual tracks (with tag lookup) from that file?
tracks, yes.  I don't know of one that will rip the entire cd (talking an audio cd now)
i wrote a script that did it using jack but the track info lookup no longer works  :-(
yes, I don't know a way around that, and I doubt there is one.
